events.name: VisibleChanged
events.description: Fired when the visibility of the widget changes.

properties.name: alignment
properties.description:
Alignment of the Bar. Possible Values:
horizontal: elements aligned from left to right. no line break vertical: elements aligned from left to right. with line break

properties.name: childPositioning
properties.description: positioning of child elements (widgets)

properties.name: ellipsis
properties.description: ellipsis for the Label

properties.name: enable
properties.description: Initial option to enable widget.

properties.name: float
properties.description: Floating of the childelements if childPositioning=relative

properties.name: image
properties.description:
Image path for the Label

When svg - graphics are used, be sure that in your *.svg-file height and width attributes are specified on the <svg> element. For more detailed information see https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/struct.html (chapter 5.1.2)

properties.name: imageAlign
properties.description:
imageAlign for the Label
defines the Position of the image relative to the text
possible values: left(left of text)/right(right of text)

properties.name: maxHeight
properties.description: Maximum height the GroupBox can grow, when childPositioning='relative'

properties.name: permissionOperate
properties.description: restricts operability to users, which have given roles

properties.name: permissionView
properties.description: restricts visibility to users, which have given roles

properties.name: style
properties.description: reference to a style for this widget type

properties.name: text
properties.description: text for the Label

properties.name: tooltip
properties.description: reference to a tooltip for a widget

properties.name: visible
properties.description: change visibility

properties.name: imageHeight
properties.description: height of the image

properties.name: imageWidth
properties.description: width of the image

properties.name: zIndex
properties.description:
The zIndex property specifies the z-order of a widget and its childs.
When widgets overlap, z-order determines which one covers the other. A widget with a larger zIndex generally covers a widget with a lower one.
The zIndex must be unique within a content.

properties.name: left
properties.description: absolute position measured from left boundary of parent container

properties.name: top
properties.description: absolute position measured from top boundary of parent container

properties.name: height
properties.description: outer height of widget

properties.name: width
properties.description: outer width of widget

descriptions.de: Zeigt einen Rahmen um eine Gruppe von Widgets; optional mit einem Beschriftungstext
descriptions.en: Displays a frame around a group of widgets with an optional caption

Description: Sets the width of the border of the widget. For further information, please check its type
Sets the radius of the widget rounded corners. For further information, please check its type
Sets the background color of the group-box
Sets the background color of the group-box header
Sets the border color of the group-box. For further information, please check its type
Style of the Border of the widget
Sets the color of the header text
Color of the image - only apply if a SVG image is used
Fontsize of the text in pixel
outer height and width of widget
